title: An Act adding an indigenous member to the Massachusetts Historical Commission

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Moakley of Falmouth, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3390) of Thomas W. Moakley relative to adding an indigenous tribal member to the Massachusetts Historical Commission.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight
